mapper.insert: insert into users (id, num, user_name, login_name, password, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIME})
mapper.update: update users set num = #{num,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIME}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIME} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, num, user_name, login_name, password, create_time, update_time from users
